meanings.definition: To remove liquid from a container or area
meanings.sent1: I need to drain the water from the sink.
meanings.sent2: After washing the dishes, I always drain the water out.
meanings.sent3: Trying to drink all the water in the pool would certainly drain me!
meanings.sent4: Her constant complaints drain my patience like a leaky faucet.
meanings.sent5: The drain in the bathtub was clogged with hair and soap scum.

meanings.definition: A pipe or channel used to carry off liquid
meanings.sent1: The rainwater flowed swiftly through the drain.
meanings.sent2: The plumber fixed the clogged drain in the kitchen sink.
meanings.sent3: The drain gurgled happily as it carried away the excess water.
meanings.sent4: The drain acted like a loyal servant, never failing to carry off the rainwater.
meanings.sent5: The drain was blocked by fallen leaves, causing a small flood in the yard.

meanings.definition: To exhaust physical or mental energy
meanings.sent1: The long hike really drained me.
meanings.sent2: Studying for hours can drain your mental energy.
meanings.sent3: Playing video games all night will drain your energy levels.
meanings.sent4: The intense workout drained all my strength.
meanings.sent5: The challenging puzzle drained my brainpower.

meanings.definition: A decrease in resources or energy
meanings.sent1: The constant demands at work led to a drain on my energy.
meanings.sent2: There was a noticeable drain in the company's finances.
meanings.sent3: The leak in the roof caused a drain on our savings.
meanings.sent4: The ongoing drought resulted in a drain on the water supply.
meanings.sent5: The drain on natural resources is a growing concern for environmentalists.

meanings.definition: To cause someone to feel tired or demoralized
meanings.sent1: The never-ending meetings really drain me.
meanings.sent2: Constant criticism can drain a person's spirit.
meanings.sent3: Her negative comments always manage to drain my enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The difficult project drained him of all motivation.
meanings.sent5: The toxic work environment can drain employees of their passion.
